snippet: Fighters aligned with the Islamic State who control the Libyan city of Surt have begun clashing with a brigade from the neighboring city of Misurata that is trying to drive them out, according to news reports on Tuesday.
abstract: Islamic State-aligned fighters clash with Misurata militias in Surt, Libya; prominent Tunisian militant Ahmed al-Ruwaysi is reportedly killed during fight.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya.

lead_paragraph: Fighters aligned with the Islamic State who control the Libyan city of Surt have begun clashing with a brigade from the neighboring city of Misurata that is trying to drive them out, according to news reports on Tuesday.

headline.main: Brigade Takes On ISIS Allies in Libya
headline.print_headline: Brigade Takes On ISIS Allies in Libya

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
